title: Jay Mohr: Funny for a Girl
original_title: Jay Mohr: Funny for a Girl
overview: Jay Mohr's newest one hour special, and the first in over 7 years, is a hilarious set of stories of the challenges of raising two kids, keeping his family on the right path, along with his legendary impressions (Christopher Walken, Norm MacDonald, Adam Sandler and a host of others) and riotous real life Hollywood stories. As Jay says, "the stories are all true" and they're all funny too.

production_companies.name: California Theater of the Performing Arts
